Reason: The configuration option 'hinted_handoff_enabled' is performance-sensitive. The method 'hintedHandoffEnabled' directly reads the value of 'conf.hinted_handoff_enabled' to determine whether hinted handoff is enabled or not. This configuration directly affects the system performance by enabling or disabling hinted handoff, which can have a notable impact on performance at the system level, especially in scenarios where hinted handoff plays a crucial role in system operations.
